title: 5 Bedroom 3 1/2 Bath Home With Pool!  Spectacular View!
description: Welcome to Elk Creek Farm, a distinctive and distinguished estate in beautiful Bucks County, Pennsylvania. An exceptional, idyllic retreat that brings nature to your doorstep with spectacular panoramic views and natural landscaping features. Available to lease, fully furnished is the magnificent reproduction Manor Home, the centerpiece of this fine country property. This 15-room Colonial boasts over 5200 square feet of sun-filled living spaces on three levels. Built to exacting specifications to incorporate the details of a nineteenth century home, it has the charm and appeal of yesteryear together with the convenience of today's modern amenities. The spacious grand foyer is the gateway to graciously proportioned rooms, four fireplaces, deep sill windows and a wood paneled library with built-ins. The four season room extends the width of the house and has walls of windows to take in the stunning views. Step outdoors to enjoy the meandering stone and brick walkways and patios with a built-in cooking area overlooking the heated swimming pool, tennis court, and glistening pond with fountain aerators and a detached, oversized, 3-car garage. The gracious floor plan invites entertaining - whether a small, intimate gathering or a grand event - yet it radiates warmth and comfort for family living. It features 5 spacious bedrooms, 3-1/2 baths, and a walk-out lower level with a fireplace and multi-activity areas. The master retreat appeals with a cozy fireplace and dressing area. Not far from New York City and Philadelphia, as well as the outstanding cultural, shopping and dining amenities of the Delaware River area, the estate celebrates the natural beauty, spirit and agricultural history of the area offering the very best of sophisticated and gracious living and entertaining on a working farm.

title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 1/2 Bath Townhouse For Rent!  Pets Ok
description:
Beautifully updated and maintained, 2-story Crestwood Condo! This stunning home features 2 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms. On the first floor you will find an open floor plan with hardwood floors, a cozy fireplace, a half bath, and a new sliding glass door leading to your own personal patio. The updated kitchen with stainless steel appliance boasts luxurious granite countertops. On the second floor you will find the master bedroom with a large walk-in closet and private bath and the skylights allow a glow of natural light. Also, a second nicely sized bedroom and a hall bathroom. The loft area has been tastefully finished and provides additional living space located above the laundry room. Community includes pool and use of gym and playground. This home is convenient to major highways, shopping, and local entertainment. Owner pays condo fees.
An application for lease will require a $38.00 non-refundable credit and background check, payable online through RentSpree. The owner requires a credit score of at least 640. title: Beautiful West Philly One Bedroom
description:
1 bedroom apartment available in West Philly (47th and Hazel) July 1st. You would be taking over a lease that ends May 31st 2024, with the option for renewal.
Rent is $1465/month. There is a $20/month flat fee for water. Gas and electric are paid by tenant.
This is a gorgeous and sun-filled apartment on the first floor of a three story building. There is a large, bright living room, a nice sized bedroom, a beautiful sunroom, and a small but workable kitchen. In addition, you have private access to the backyard and your own private entrance through the back of the house. Laundry is in the basement.
The entire apartment was freshly painted a year ago, and the fridge and stove/oven are both brand new. The landlords are responsive to any questions or issues that come up.
Central A/C and ceiling fans in living room and bedroom.
The apartment is in the heart of West Philly, a short walk away from Clark Park, and close to lots of restaurants, coffee shops, convenience stores and bars. The building is quiet and the neighbor is calm but feels alive.
I have loved living here, and would not leave except for having purchased a home of my own!
Email or call to set up a showing. If you would like to apply, I will connect you with the property company and you will go through their application process, which includes a $65 application fee.

description:
Welcome to 90 E Laurel St #B, a stunning bilevel apartment located in the highly sought-after Northern Liberties neighborhood of Philadelphia. This 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment boasts modern amenities and a prime location for an unbeatable rental experience. The open floor plan and stylish finishes create a bright and airy feel throughout the space, making it perfect for those who value comfort and style. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and plenty of cabinet space, while the living area is perfect for entertaining guests or simply relaxing after a long day. The rooftop deck is one of the highlights of this apartment, providing stunning views of the city skyline. The in-unit washer and dryer also add to the convenience and comfort of living at 90 E Laurel St #B. title: Enjoy Logan Square's convenience and contemporary styling!
description:
Enjoy Logan Square's convenience and contemporary styling in this expansive two-bedroom, two-bathroom condominium with a private balcony and parking in Center City. Spanning 1,264 square feet, this lovely sun-splashed condo invites you inside with a gracious tiled foyer lined by three extra-large closets. Ahead, the corner living room provides a generous footprint for seating and dining areas alongside southern and western exposures and a private balcony with iconic skyline views. Chefs will love the windowed eat-in kitchen featuring rows of wood cabinetry, granite counters, a breakfast bar, and a fleet of stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and built-in microwave. The desirable split-bedroom layout includes a serene primary suite with a large walk-in closet and an en suite bathroom. Near the entry, a spacious secondary bedroom offers easy access to the full second bathroom. Three zoned HVAC and an in-unit washer-dryer add comfort and convenience. This rental includes a large storage unit and one assigned parking space. 2201 Cherry Street is a pet-friendly, elevator condominium in the centrally located Logan Square neighborhood, surrounded by the best of Philadelphia living. Enjoy fantastic shopping, dining, nightlife, and entertainment venues in every direction. Visit the city's renowned Parkway Museum District institutions, or amble along the Schuylkill River Trail to Boathouse Row. You'll find Trader Joe's and GIANT nearby, while Penn, Drexel, and Rittenhouse Square are just minutes away. The 22nd Street trolley station, SEPTA Suburban Station, 30th Street Station, and Schuylkill Expressway are all within blocks, providing easy access to the rest of the city and beyond. *Photos are from when the unit was previously staged.
2201 Cherry St #502

title: 4 bed, 3 bath town home was renovated in 2015 and is move-in ready!
description:
This beautiful 4 bed, 3 bath town home was renovated in 2015 and is move-in ready. Enter through the extra-large front patio area and into the enormous living area where you will be greeted with high ceilings, recessed lighting and dark hardwood floors throughout. The living area showcases an elegant gas fireplace with custom v-stone surroundings. Towards the rear is the huge eat-in kitchen with custom cabinetry, a large island, wine cooler, glass tile backsplash and quartz counter tops. The kitchen also comes equipped with all top of the line, stainless steel appliances! On the second floor are two large bedrooms each with closets including custom shelving and drawers, as well as a shared full hall bath with soaking tub and dual vanity. In the hallway is an a convenienty located laundry room with full sized washer/dryer and granite counter top for folding and upper cabinet space. Take a short trip up to the third floor master suite which includes a wet bar with wine cooler, his & hers closets space, a large bedroom area with a front facing deck and beautiful skyline views. The ensuite bathroom has a large shower with handheld spray showerhead, a large soaking tub, Badoglio marble on the floor and walls and dual vanities with marble tops. Don't forget the large fiberglass roof deck with gas line for grilling, outdoor speakers and unbeatable 360 degree views of Philadelphia. Last but not least is the full finished basement! Your basement space features a living area with custom shelving and wet bar with wine cooler, sink and quartz counter top. There is also a fourth bedroom accompanied by a full bathroom and shower with frameless glass enclosure. Additionally, your home comes prepared with in-ceiling speakers throughout, video intercom system, window treatments, back patio area and dual zoned HVAC. Located in Graduate Hospital, one of the most vibrant neighborhoods in the city, you will be in proximity to shopping, restaurants and schools. Don't miss you chance to rent this once of a kind home!
2236 Bainbridge St

title: NEWLY RENOVATED TWO BEDROOMS AT EMERSON APARTMENTS!!
description:
EMERSON APARTMENTS
We are located in the greater northeast section of Philadelphia right off of Bustleton
Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand
new kitchens and bathrooms! Parking lot in the rear of the building and laundry facilities on site!
Heat, hot water and cooking gas included!
Don’t miss this opportunity to find the home you will love!
Please give us a call or send an email to schedule an appointment for a viewing.
Physical applications are on site.
You may bring along the following so you can apply the same day:
1. The application fee in the form of a money order. The
application fee is $75 for up to two applicants.
*Any adult moving in MUST be on the application.
*Must be 21 years of age or older
2. A copy of your social security card and ID is recommended.
In order to qualify for an apartment, your credit report must have no relevant
landlord tenant filings or evictions. In addition, you cannot have an arrest
record. Your income needs to be at least two - three times the cost of rent.

description:
N Broad St, Philadelphia, PA 19123Welcome to Mily on Green. Designed for community, flexibility, and functionality, your new home offers spacious 2- and 3-bedroom apartments with high-end appliances, an in-unit washer/dryer, and built-in storage. You’ll find beautiful amenities right outside your door, including a second floor lounge ideal for working parents. Divided into several separate but interconnected spaces, the lounge offers room for coworking, family time, and group gatherings, along with a dedicated space for children and playtime. For a breath of fresh air, head up to the expansive rooftop deck. There you’ll find a cozy indoor lounge that looks out onto the 9,700 square foot green roof, complete with a variety of seating perfect for gazing onto city views or taking in the lush rooftop landscaping. title: Rare 5 Bed 2 Bath House University City
description:
Large 5 bed 2 bath home next to St. Joseph's University City and UPENN campuses! Perfect for student housing. It is a short walk to everything! On the first floor you will find an enclosed porch, living room, dining room, eat in kitchen and a full bath. High ceilings and hardwood floors create a very open atmosphere. Upstairs is where you will find 5 spacious bedrooms and another full bath. Amenities include stainless steel appliances, central air/heat and full size washer and dryer in the basement to name a few. This wonderful house will be ready for move June 15th. Don't miss out by not scheduling your tour ASAP!
Tenants are responsible for all utilities. Electric, gas and cable/internet.
Don't forget to check out the requirements.
Requirements:
Application fee is $50 per person over the age of 18 that will be residing in the apartment.
Minimum credit score of at least 600 or close. No evictions or repossessions.
Total household monthly income needs to be at least 3x the rent. (2650 x 3= $7950)
First, last & security due before move in.
Pets:
No aggressive breeds. 50lb max, limit of 2. $250 non-refundable pet deposit. $25 pet rent per pet.
Contact Kurlene at  show contact info
with any questions or to schedule a tour! More properties available at www.PennbrookMgmt.com

title: Airy and Bright 2 Bed with Original Details in Fairmount
description: Charming Fairmount rowhome with wonderful original details, sunny exposure and spa like bathroom now available for lease. This corner property with windows on three sides is located in the heart of Fairmount and only steps away from the attractions of Girard Avenue, Fairmount Avenue, the Parkway, and Fairmount Park. The entry is located on Bailey Street a quiet leafy street with friendly neighbors and opens to the living room. An open concept layout with original wood flooring, the entire first floor is free flowing with the kitchen centered around a large island and large sliding glass doors that lead out to a peaceful patio. The light filled dining area is backed by a wall of bookshelves. The original staircase features a skylight bringing light into both floors. To the rear, a large bedroom is framed by an arched doorway and is connected to a spa like bathroom featuring a large vanity, and shower, as well as a large jacuzzi tub with views through the sunny bay window. An additional bedroom in the front features an original built in closet and more book shelves. The basement comprises the entire foot print of the property providing clean and dry storage as well as a washer and dryer.

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with Wood Floors on Rittenhouse Square
description:
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home at 712 on 7th floor
* Renovated kitchen and bathroom
* Granite kitchen counters
* White kitchen cabinets
* Wood floors
* Large south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* Double-Pane windows
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included
Community Amenities:
* Laundry room on every floor and third floor laundry facility
* Bicycle storage
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* 8,000-square-foot lounge with seating areas, pool table, conference room, kitchen, and more!
* Fitness center
* Yoga studio
* Sauna
* Dog spa
* Guest suites
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Elevator building with front door attendant and front desk concierge
* Online resident portal RentCafe for maintenance requests, rent payments, lease renewals, and more
* On-site maintenance
* Attached valet parking garage! Parking spaces not managed by community, so the cost is separate.
* Roof deck under renovation until spring 2023
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to retail stores, grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Vans, Free People, Paper Source, Anthropologie, Lagos, Madewell, Tiffany & Co., Brooklinen, and Sephora. Go grocery shopping at Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., Rittenhouse Market, Target, Maxx's Produce, Food & Friends, Spruce Market, Trader Joe's, and Giant. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Pietro's, and a.kitchen. Buy a brookie or scone from the Bakeshop on 20th. Have a facial at Rescue Spa. View the collection at The Mütter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 712 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Schedule an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, the chatbot concierge, at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Rittenhouse Claridge
Price is for the 22 month lease term. For an unfurnished home, 2 to 22 month lease terms are available! Price depends upon lease term and move-in date. Check out our website for current pricing!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
We can furnish a home over two weeks following rental application approval and after the home is made ready. Please note that there is a three-month lease term minimum for a home that we have furnished for you. You would pay a furnished rent that we would be happy to calculate for you. Additional pieces of furniture, furniture upgrades, housewares as well as cable and internet set up by us are optional, thus impact the furnished rate.
Welcome home!

title: apartment with a bedroom and a bathroom
description:
This cozy and modern one bedroom apartment offers a comfortable and convenient living space for singles, couples, or small families. The apartment features a spacious bedroom with a large window that lets in plenty of natural light and offers a lovely view of the surroundings. The bedroom is furnished with a comfortable queen-size bed, nightstands, and a wardrobe.
The open-plan living area is designed to maximize space and functionality, and features a comfortable sofa, coffee table, and a flat-screen TV. The kitchen is fully equipped with modern appliances, including a stove, oven, refrigerator, microwave, and dishwasher. The dining area is adjacent to the kitchen and has a table and chairs for comfortable dining.
The bathroom is sleek and modern, with a walk-in shower, vanity sink, and a toilet. The apartment also has a small balcony or patio, perfect for enjoying a cup of coffee or tea in the morning or a glass of wine in the evening.
Other features of this apartment include air conditioning, high-speed internet, and laundry facilities on-site or in the building. The building may also offer amenities such as a fitness center, pool, or community room for residents to use.
Overall, this one bedroom and one bathroom apartment provides a comfortable and modern living space that is perfect for those who value convenience and practicality. We are located in  1125 Sansom St, Philadelphia, PA 19107

title: 2051 Walnut St #4R, Philadelphia, PA
description:
This apartment is great for anyone who wants to be close to the heart of the city! This is a one bed one bathroom apartment with nice hard wood floors. Gets a lot of sunshine! Only a block away from Rittenhouse square and a Farmers Market! This 4th-floor walk-up unit is available for an early June move-in or can be held till July 1st.
Pets are welcome!
Appointments are available 7 days a week between 9 am - 7:30. Please note units for the spring will require at least 24 hours notice to the current tenant to gain entry. Any vacant unit can be held till July 1st with a deposit.
We have a $40 application fee, we take one month in security to take the unit off the market, and a full first month's rent is due at move-in. Your 2nd month's rent would be prorated if you do not start your lease on the first day of the month.
Applications can be found on our website
Please text or call to set up an appointment

title: Beautiful and SPACIOUS Rittenhouse One BR / one Bath with PARKING
description:
One block away from the iconic Rittenhouse square park you find this incredibly unique and beautiful rowhouse apartment with soaring 10 foot ceilings, an enormous amount of natural light and washer and dryer inside the unit.  The apartment has an enormous one bedroom with exposed brick. It is the absolutely perfect space with a parking space available in the back which is included in the $1,700 monthly rent.
The apartment will be available June 5th and we are looking for someone to take over our lease through the end of October, with the option to re-sign a year lease at the end of the sublet. We have decided to move as we bought a house but we are so sad to be leaving this place, it is truly a gem. Please reach out if interested.

title: $1,500/mo 2 bedroom 1 bathroom 750 sqft
description:
Beautiful fully rehabbed home in a bustling neighborhood! This newly transformed 2 story home features 2 beds, 1 bath, a basement, and a rear patio. Your main level has an open floor layout highlighting recessed lighting & gorgeous textured floors leading you back to your new kitchen. Stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, with an accenting backsplash round out your kitchen space. Walk out your back door to your very own private fully paved patio. The perfect place to grill and entertain your family and friends. The 2nd level had 2 nicely sized bedrooms with double door closets and an updated full bath. The basement has your washer and dryer and is the perfect place to transform into a workout area or use for extra storage. This home is perfectly situated home in the Port Richmond neighborhood near parks including Richmond Playground, Aramingo Square, and Cohocksink Recreation Center. Transportation in and out of Center City is made easy being near the Market-Frankford line and local bus stops. Enjoy being able to walk to many restaurants and cafes especially Philly's famous Stocks Bakery!!  show contact info

Located on the border of Brewerytown & Strawberry Mansion, this area has more and more to offer every day! Aside from Wok Works directly across from the property, enjoy catching drinks and snacks at the Crime and Punishment Brewerytown, lunch at Vento or Ryebread, or have dinner at Nine Thai! description:
N Broad St, Philadelphia, PA 19123Welcome to Mily on Green. Designed for community, flexibility, and functionality, your new home offers spacious 2- and 3-bedroom apartments with high-end appliances, an in-unit washer/dryer, and built-in storage. 917 Corinthian Ave – Available Now

Come home to the warm embrace of this Art Museum 1 bed 1 bath bi-level apt–with amenities tailored to enhance your lifestyle! Enjoy a stroll to the Barnes Foundation, Philadelphia Art Museum, Eastern State Penitentiary, as well as, an assortment of memorable bars & restaurants the neighborhood has to offer such as: Bar Hyyge, Bad Brother and Urban Saloon. A full sized bathroom, sizable bedroom and tons of closet space also make up the main level. A versatile sublevel space presents a setting for a potential office, home gym or simply whatever your heart desires.

There is a common area laundry room on site with several coin operated washers and dryers, as well a designated trash area. This property is dazzling with so much to offer and it won’t last long! title: Sunlit Loft Style Apartments at Sherman Mills!
description:
Experience the Lofts at Sherman Mills! This peaceful and quiet community in East Falls is only a few minutes away from the city of Philadelphia but is removed from the "hustle and bustle" of city life. Sherman Mills offers a community filled with sunlit lofts for residential living and commercial spaces for a variety of different businesses. This old factory building was refurbished into beautiful spacious lofts filled with charm and character. Many of our premium spaces include large windows with tons of natural sunlight, exposed brick or stone detail, large jacuzzi tubs, walk-in closets, washers and dryers, and kitchens with modern appliances.
Sherman Mills is conveniently located near many Philadelphia attractions such as the Philadelphia Museum of Art, Boat House Row, the picturesque Kelly Drive, The Schuylkill River and the Wissahickon Valley Park. The complex is accessible to Route 1, Interstate 76, and Kelly Drive as well as easy access to public transportation.
We look forward to welcoming you to our community!
Amenities Include:
- Free Parking
- Free Fitness Facility
- Pet Friendly
- Washers/Dryers on site and in select units
- Community Courtyard
- Community Dog Park
- Secured Package Mail Room

description:
Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city and surrounding areas. Blocks away from award winning restaurants and theatres. This stunning 4 floor townhome with over 3,000 square feet of livable space offers an open concept great outdoor space with a patio off the kitchen and a deck off the hallway on 3rd floor, which gives an amazing view of the center city skyline. The interior of the home has 5 bedrooms , 4.5 bathrooms and finished basemen and 2 car garage with additional storage. The entrance to the home is accessed from a private walk -way off of 15th St. or from the garage . Step inside and you are greeted by luxurious amenities and stylish finishes . At the rear of the hallway sits bedroom #3. Head up to the 4th floor and you will find two more bedrooms and a hall bath, laundry room , storage space and deck that over looks the center city skyline. The basement is fully finished with full bathroom , very high ceilings, great for entertaining, gym or private living quarters. The two car garage has two entrances one leading directly into foyer and one that leads to basement. Truly a must see!

title: Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium
description:
Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium. Located at 1600 Arch Street in the heart of Center City Philadelphia, Unit 1010 is an exceptional studio apartment with premium finishes and fixtures. The apartment contains a washer/dryer, dishwasher, ample pantry space, two closets, hardwood flooring, a high ceiling, and a modernized kitchen and bathroom. The Phoenix boasts a 24-hour concierge, valet parking, curated amenity space, including a state-of-the-art fitness center and weight room, a resident lounge with event space, a conference room, a bike storage room, and a spacious outdoor terrace with stunning views. Additional amenities include a full-service restaurant (Tir Na Nog Irish Bar and Grill), Starbucks, WSFS Bank, and a recently announced grab-and-go mart on the concourse level. The Phoenix is situated near some of the finest parks, restaurants, and shopping Philadelphia has to offer, with City Hall and Dilworth Park directly across the street. It is conveniently located with elevator access to Suburban Station and minutes from major thoroughfares I-95 and I-76. Tenant responsible for utilities. One-time move-in/move-out fee of $400.
